title: Medieval Twitch and Grey Warwick
body: I feel that it is incredibly unfair that the original owners of these skins recieved no compensation of any sort with the recent re-release. Both these skins have a rarity comparible to the original Championship Riven skin at least. I have listed a few ideas for small but meaningful gifts for the owners of the original skin. What are everyone's thoughts?

replies.body: i can see your point but the original way to get the skins was 100% free so i dont see the point of giving compensation for it
While the skins were "free" in monetary value, they did require effort to actually earn thus their rarity. A lot of rare collectables were initially "free". Doesn't mean that they hold no value.

But unlike championship Riven they were:

A. Available to acquire for a very long time
B. FREE

Hey Zubat,

We always aspired to bring them back. We even said so in the RaF retirment post!

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/refer-friend-retires-thirty-days

For those that already have these skins, we'll be adding more rewards over time and they'll still be able to get loading screen flairs, key frags, champ shards, and EoS rewards!
